job_title: Certified Flight Instructor in Billings, MT
pros: Structured environment, is very safe and has good maintenance
cons: You are paid once a month, sometimes 141 environment isn’t very flexible

review_title: Great learning experience, also a great place to network. Fun and rewarding seeing your students advance.
pros: Great learning experience, rewarding, fun, If you want to become a professional pilot, flight instruction is one of the best ways to get there. You learn tons and build hours while doing it.
cons: Low pay, frustrating when students don't show initiative in their advancement, not getting paid for time working but only for ground or flight time,

job_title: Academic Computing Work Study in Billings, MT
pros: Rocky has some great programs encouraging and aiding students in work study programs. This helps students get real world experience during their educational career.
cons: Work study is often included and expected as part of a students' financial aid package, which can deflate their available aid from other sources.

pros: academic schedule is always a perk
